Home / SCMC

SCMC Videos

A working-group archive from Software Craftsmanship McHenry County, focused on practical engineering, shared learning, and talks that stood up to real delivery work.

SCMC was a place for practitioners to test ideas in public, teach from direct experience, and keep technical standards grounded in day-to-day work.

  • This collection includes session recordings and community interviews from that period.
  • Topics span craftsmanship, programming languages, tooling, and implementation tradeoffs.
  • Use this page as a starting point, then follow each item into the full video and transcript context.
